casebody.data:
Deutsche Bank Compagnie Financiere Luxembourg, S. A., et al. v. Karl L. Hermann et al. (11991)

O’Connell, Heiman and Freedman, Js.

Argued April 4 decision released April 26, 1994 Robert A. Schmitz, pro se, with whom was Marion B. Schmitz, pro se, the appellants (named defendant et al.). John F. Lambert, with whom was Thomas F. Hartch, for the appellees (plaintiffs). Per Curiam.

The judgment is affirmed.
